attributes.action: Make available on the NHS Nuchal Fold Scans
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Make available on NHS for women to have Nuchal Fold Scans at 12 weeks. To screen for Downs Syndrome in their unborn babies.  This will give women an earier chance of finding out if there unborn baby is a carrier.  This is around £150-£200. What do we pay national insurance for?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
